text:
Oh...
What's up with that camera?

Yeah, I want to take some shots of the rehearsal
scenes for promotion leading up to the live.

I thought it would be great to stream them on social
media so that people coming can get more excited...

Alright, but now?
Even though I'm all sweaty and messy...

Oh,
I actually think that's beautiful.

Whether it's the Juri on stage, the Juri taking a break,
or the Juri sweating it out in rehearsal, all of it...

Ah! Geez!
Fine, fine, I'll do it.
So just take some shots casually.

I won't do it casually, you know?
When I do something, I do it seriously...

Okay, okay! Got it!
Well then, please do it nicely!
